metadata.Plot: Julia Jones is unhappy. She's overweight, spends forever working at her fathers diner, and believes she will always be lonely. This is until she meets Grant Fockyerdoder. Before they can have their dream wedding, they must meet each others parents and survive the scheming Andy.
metadata.Actors: Alyson Hannigan, Adam Campbell, Fred Willard
